'''Adhigama Wood Open-Air Food Stall''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Adhigama Wood Open-Air Food Stall is obtainable from [[Menakeri's Treasure Shop]] for 10 [[Dendro Sigil]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
